changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE SME ( ID INT8 NOT NULL, NAME VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, CODE VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, DESCRIPTION VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, ACTIVE BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT TRUE, CREATED_BY INT8, LAST_MODIFIED_BY INT8, CREATED_AT TIMESTAMP(6), DELETED_AT TIMESTAMP(6), DELETED_BY INT8, LAST_MODIFIED_AT TIMESTAMP(6), CONSTRAINT APP_SME_PKEY PRIMARY KEY (ID), CONSTRAINT APP_SME_UKEY UNIQUE (CODE) );
